sections.content:
Question:
Where can I obtain more information about CTSU?
Answer:
Refer to Capacitive Touch Sensor System (2nd Generation Capacitive Touch Sensor System).
https://www.renesas.com/us/en/application/key-technology/hmi/2nd-generation-capacitive-touch-sensor-system
Suitable Products
RX113
RX130
RX231, RX230
